original_title: Trump says Smithsonian is 'OUT OF CONTROL,' will be dealt with like the colleges were  — The Donald
article_summary: Former President Trump criticizes the Smithsonian for promoting a negative image of the U.S., suggesting it needs reform similar to colleges. Users suggest various methods to address the issue, including firing staff, reclaiming heritage, and even using technology to deal with perceived communist influences. Some users express concerns about the Smithsonian's handling of artifacts and potential censorship of inconvenient history.</s>
